content: As an AI language model, I do not have personal beliefs or values in the same way that humans do. However, there are several factors that cities consider when deciding to control pigeon populations. Overpopulation of pigeons can lead to various problems, such as disease transmission and mess caused by their droppings. In some cases, the droppings can cause damage to buildings and other structures. Therefore, it may be appropriate for cities to implement measures to manage the population size to mitigate these issues. Still, it is essential to consider humane and ethical population control strategies that cause minimal harm to the pigeons.
